name: contestorganizer-api
description: The api to make the Contest Organizer connected

scripts.create_rep: mkdir -p /var/www/marius.click/html/contest/api/data && chown -R fedora:nginx /var/www/marius.click/html/contest/api/data && chmod -R g+w /var/www/marius.click/html/contest/api/data && chcon -R -t httpd_sys_rw_content_t /var/www/marius.click/html/contest/api/data
scripts.copy_files: npm run copy_index && npm run copy_models && npm run copy_controllers && npm run copy_utils
scripts.restore-data: npm run restore-api-data && npm run restore-api-group && npm run restore-api-rights-grw
scripts.prod: npm run backup-api-data && npm run remove_reps && npm run create_rep && npm run copy_files && npm run restore-data
scripts.start: npm run prod && npm run watch
scripts.copy_files: npm run copy_index && npm run copy_config && npm run copy_models && npm run copy_controllers && npm run copy_utils
scripts.prod: npm run remove_rep && npm run create_rep && npm run copy_files
scripts.copy_files_preprod: npm run copy_index_preprod && npm run copy_config_preprod && npm run copy_models_preprod && npm run copy_controllers_preprod && npm run copy_utils_preprod
scripts.pre-prod: npm run remove_rep_preprod && npm run create_rep_preprod && npm run copy_files_preprod

author: Mad Martigane
